data.message: I got a suggestion for a Facebook update, when you look at the people who are in your contacts, there should be a clock next to their name so it tells me what time it is in their area so I don't contact them when it's 6 PM here and 4 AM where my friend lives. Just my two cents.

replies.message: We appreciate all of the feedback we receive from the Facebook community, Steven. We're constantly working to improve everyone's experience on Facebook thanks to your feedback, so please keep it coming! -Brittany
Anytime, I've used Facebook for nine years and it brought me and my friends together. I only wish people didn't cause so much drama on here. I just avoid and block people if they give me a hard time.
Facebook  can I please talk to a real person? Not a knowledge base or forum because it is not helping.
